statements: SELECT * FROM treatment_methods
SELECT patient_id, treatment_type FROM treatment_methods ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT treatment_type, success_rate FROM treatment_methods WHERE treatment_duration > 10
SELECT AVG(success_rate) AS avg_success_rate FROM treatment_methods
SELECT patient_id, treatment_type, treatment_duration, success_rate FROM treatment_methods WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT * FROM treatment_methods ORDER BY patient_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT patient_id, treatment_type FROM treatment_methods WHERE treatment_duration > 5 ORDER BY treatment_duration ASC LIMIT 2
SELECT AVG(success_rate) AS avg_success_rate, COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM treatment_methods
SELECT patient_id, treatment_type, success_rate FROM treatment_methods WHERE treatment_type LIKE 'C%'
SELECT patient_id, treatment_type, treatment_duration FROM treatment_methods WHERE success_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY treatment_duration DESC LIMIT 4
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_method FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, success_rate FROM patients INNER JOIN treatments ON patients.treatment_method = treatments.treatment_name;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_name FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.treatment_method = treatments.treatment_name;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, cost FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.treatment_method = treatments.treatment_name WHERE cost > 500 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT gender, diagnosis, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM patients GROUP BY gender, diagnosis ORDER BY average_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, success_rate FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.treatment_method = treatments.treatment_name WHERE success_rate > 0.7 ORDER BY success_rate DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients
SELECT treatment_name, description FROM Treatments
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment_method FROM Patients
SELECT * FROM PatientTreatments
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis='Fever' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;

SELECT patient_id, patient_name, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM Patients JOIN PatientTreatments ON Patients.patient_id = PatientTreatments.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON PatientTreatments.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Patients.diagnosis, Treatments.treatment_name, PatientTreatments.outcome FROM Patients LEFT JOIN PatientTreatments ON Patients.patient_id = PatientTreatments.patient_id LEFT JOIN Treatments ON PatientTreatments.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id WHERE outcome='Successful';

SELECT patient_id, patient_name, treatment_name, outcome FROM Patients JOIN PatientTreatments ON Patients.patient_id = PatientTreatments.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON PatientTreatments.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id WHERE diagnosis='Cancer' ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_name, success_rate FROM Treatments WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT method_name, effectiveness_score FROM TreatmentMethods ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentMethods WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT treatment_name, success_rate FROM Treatments ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, date_given FROM Patients p JOIN PatientTreatmentHistory h ON p.patient_id = h.patient_id;
SELECT method_name, effectiveness_score FROM TreatmentMethods WHERE method_name LIKE '%physical%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_method, treatment_start_date FROM patients WHERE treatment_method = 'Medication';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital FROM doctors ORDER BY specialty ASC;

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, outcome_description, outcome_date FROM patients JOIN patient_medical_history ON patients.patient_id = patient_medical_history.patient_id JOIN treatment_outcomes ON patients.patient_id = treatment_outcomes.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, treatment_method FROM patients JOIN patient_medical_history ON patients.patient_id = patient_medical_history.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT treatment_name, effectiveness_rating FROM treatments WHERE treatment_id IN (SELECT treatment_id FROM patient_medical_history WHERE diagnosis = 'Diabetes');
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital FROM doctors ORDER BY specialty, doctor_name;

SELECT patient_name, treatment_method, outcome_description FROM patients JOIN treatment_outcomes ON patients.patient_id = treatment_outcomes.patient_id WHERE effectiveness_rating >= 4 ORDER BY outcome_date DESC;
